             \/    \/                \/

Oraculum's Tabular plugin provides a set of definitions and mixins that aim to solve the problems of rendering collections as a two-dimensional array of models (rows) and their attributes (columns) (eg, a table). It prescribes a set of patterns and interfaces that lean on Oraculum's built-in behaviors to provide this functionality in a configuration-driven way.
